name: 2D Platformer Final (sophiagrady)
description:
For this project I changed the background and difficulty.

Modifications:

level 1: I changed the background to a blue sky (link below). I created my own ground, grass, and rocks and added them to the assets. I changed the size of the game and the speed of the player and other assets. I also changed the difficulty for each level. 

Level 2: I changed the sky color so the level looks different from the first level.  I made this  level longer and more difficult. 

Credits: 

Sky: sky-cartoon-cliparts.html

Created by: Sophia Grady
